short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Uses the selected text to return a best result from HockeyDB, NHL.com, and others.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Highlight a hockey player, team, season, or draft on any web page and open the relevant page on HockeyDB, NHL.com, and many other sites in one click.

Currently supports:
HockeyDB
NHL.com
Yahoo
ESPN
TSN
PuckPedia
CapWages
RotoWire

Here are a few examples that will open the appropriate HockeyDB page:

Sidney Crosby
Crosby
1997 Draft
Sharks roster
2019 Boston players
2017 playoffs

100% private and secure, this extension does not have access to your data.
